languages.text: Тревожные донесения о гибели палубных патрулей вынудили Лорд-капитана и {mf|его|ее} свиту лично нанести визит в недра пустотного корабля. Тайна преступления была раскрыта на территории клана, обслуживающего макропушки: самоличный визит Вольного Торговца спугнул группу предателей, готовивших диверсию, и заставил действовать преждевременно. Каждая минута на счету: если бунтовщики приведут в действие взрывные аппараты, отсек ждут чудовищные разрушения! К бою!

Troubling news concerning the deaths of some patrolmen has forced the Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} retinue to descend into the voidship's depths in person. The mystery of these crimes was unravelled in the domain of a clan currently charged with macro-cannon maintenance: a personal visit from the Rogue Trader scared off a group of traitors who were preparing an act of sabotage, forcing them to act prematurely. Every minute counts: if the mutineers trigger the explosives, the bay will be obliterated! To battle!
languages.original_text: Тревожные донесения о гибели палубных патрулей вынудили Лорд-капитана и {mf|его|ее} свиту лично нанести визит в недра пустотного корабля. The mystery of these crimes was unravelled in the domain of a clan currently charged with macro-cannon maintenance: a personal visit from the Rogue Trader scared off a group of traitors who were preparing an act of sabotage, forcing them to act prematurely. Every minute counts: if the mutineers trigger the explosives, the bay will be obliterated! To battle!

languages.text: 一群警卫遭到杀害，这令人不安的消息让领主舰长和随行人员不得不亲自前往虚空舰深处。当领主舰长前往某个负责宏炮维护的氏族时，揭开了这起罪行的神秘面纱。行商浪人的造访吓跑了一群准备蓄意破坏的叛徒，叛徒被迫提前开始破坏行动。如今已分秒必争，如果叛徒引爆了炸药，那整个舱室都会被摧毁！准备战斗！
languages.original_text: Troubling news concerning the deaths of some patrolmen has forced the Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} retinue to descend into the voidship's depths in person. The mystery of these crimes was unravelled in the domain of a clan currently charged with macro-cannon maintenance: a personal visit from the Rogue Trader scared off a group of traitors who were preparing an act of sabotage, forcing them to act prematurely. Every minute counts: if the mutineers trigger the explosives, the bay will be obliterated! To battle!

traits.locale_text: 一群警卫遭到杀害，这令人不安的消息让领主舰长和随行人员不得不亲自前往虚空舰深处。当领主舰长前往某个负责宏炮维护的氏族时，揭开了这起罪行的神秘面纱。行商浪人的造访吓跑了一群准备蓄意破坏的叛徒，叛徒被迫提前开始破坏行动。如今已分秒必争，如果叛徒引爆了炸药，那整个舱室都会被摧毁！准备战斗！

languages.text: Noticias preocupantes sobre la muerte de algunos patrulleros han obligado {mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán y a su séquito a descender en persona a las profundidades de la nave del vacío. El misterio de estos crímenes se desveló en los dominios de un clan encargado del mantenimiento de los macrocañones: una visita personal {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente ahuyentó a un grupo de traidores que preparaban un acto de sabotaje, obligándolos a actuar antes de tiempo. Cada minuto cuenta: si los amotinados activan los explosivos, ¡la bodega será arrasada! ¡A la batalla!
languages.original_text: Troubling news concerning the deaths of some patrolmen has forced the Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} retinue to descend into the voidship's depths in person. The mystery of these crimes was unravelled in the domain of a clan currently charged with macro-cannon maintenance: a personal visit from the Rogue Trader scared off a group of traitors who were preparing an act of sabotage, forcing them to act prematurely. Every minute counts: if the mutineers trigger the explosives, the bay will be obliterated! To battle!

traits.locale_text: Noticias preocupantes sobre la muerte de algunos patrulleros han obligado {mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán y a su séquito a descender en persona a las profundidades de la nave del vacío. El misterio de estos crímenes se desveló en los dominios de un clan encargado del mantenimiento de los macrocañones: una visita personal {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente ahuyentó a un grupo de traidores que preparaban un acto de sabotaje, obligándolos a actuar antes de tiempo. Cada minuto cuenta: si los amotinados activan los explosivos, ¡la bodega será arrasada! ¡A la batalla!

languages.text: 一部の見回り役の不穏な死の知らせを受けて、ロード・キャプテンとその従者が直接、ヴォイドシップの奥底へ降りなければならなくなった。この事件の謎は、現在マクロキャノンのメンテナンスを任されている一族の領地で解き明かされる。自由開拓者が直々に足を運んだことで、破壊活動を計画していた裏切り者集団は恐怖に落ちいり、準備不足のまま行動せざるおえなくなった。1秒たりとも気が抜けない。反逆者が爆発物を起動してしまえば、ベイは吹き飛んでしまう！戦闘開始だ！
languages.original_text: Troubling news concerning the deaths of some patrolmen has forced the Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} retinue to descend into the voidship's depths in person. The mystery of these crimes was unravelled in the domain of a clan currently charged with macro-cannon maintenance: a personal visit from the Rogue Trader scared off a group of traitors who were preparing an act of sabotage, forcing them to act prematurely. Every minute counts: if the mutineers trigger the explosives, the bay will be obliterated! To battle!

traits.locale_text: 一部の見回り役の不穏な死の知らせを受けて、ロード・キャプテンとその従者が直接、ヴォイドシップの奥底へ降りなければならなくなった。この事件の謎は、現在マクロキャノンのメンテナンスを任されている一族の領地で解き明かされる。自由開拓者が直々に足を運んだことで、破壊活動を計画していた裏切り者集団は恐怖に落ちいり、準備不足のまま行動せざるおえなくなった。1秒たりとも気が抜けない。反逆者が爆発物を起動してしまえば、ベイは吹き飛んでしまう！戦闘開始だ！

languages.text: Les nouvelles inquiétantes de la mort de certains patrouilleurs ont poussé {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} et son entourage à s'enfoncer dans les entrailles du vaisseau. Le mystère les mène jusqu'à un clan chargé de la maintenance des macro-canons : la visite personnelle {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} perturbe les plans d'un groupe de traîtres qui préparaient un acte de sabotage, les obligeant à agir prématurément. Chaque minute compte, si les mutinés déclenchent les explosifs, c'est toute la baie qui sera anéantie ! Aux armes !
languages.original_text: Troubling news concerning the deaths of some patrolmen has forced the Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} retinue to descend into the voidship's depths in person. The mystery of these crimes was unravelled in the domain of a clan currently charged with macro-cannon maintenance: a personal visit from the Rogue Trader scared off a group of traitors who were preparing an act of sabotage, forcing them to act prematurely. Every minute counts: if the mutineers trigger the explosives, the bay will be obliterated! To battle!

traits.locale_text: Les nouvelles inquiétantes de la mort de certains patrouilleurs ont poussé {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} et son entourage à s'enfoncer dans les entrailles du vaisseau. Le mystère les mène jusqu'à un clan chargé de la maintenance des macro-canons : la visite personnelle {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} perturbe les plans d'un groupe de traîtres qui préparaient un acte de sabotage, les obligeant à agir prématurément. Chaque minute compte, si les mutinés déclenchent les explosifs, c'est toute la baie qui sera anéantie ! Aux armes !

languages.text: Beunruhigende Neuigkeiten über den Tod einiger Patrouillen haben den Lord Captain und {mf|sein|ihr} Gefolge gezwungen, sich persönlich in die Tiefen des Raumschiffs zu begeben. Das Mysterium dieser Verbrechen wurde im Reich eines Clans entschlüsselt, der momentan mit der Wartung der Makrokanonen beauftragt ist: Ein persönlicher Besuch {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} überrumpelte eine Gruppe von Verrätern, die dabei waren, einen Akt der Sabotage zu planen. Sie waren gezwungen, früher zu handeln als vorgesehen. Jede Minute zählt: Wenn die Meuterer die Sprengsätze auslösen, wird die gesamte Bucht ausgelöscht! In die Schlacht!
languages.original_text: Troubling news concerning the deaths of some patrolmen has forced the Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} retinue to descend into the voidship's depths in person. The mystery of these crimes was unravelled in the domain of a clan currently charged with macro-cannon maintenance: a personal visit from the Rogue Trader scared off a group of traitors who were preparing an act of sabotage, forcing them to act prematurely. Every minute counts: if the mutineers trigger the explosives, the bay will be obliterated! To battle!

languages.text: Devriyedeki bazı askerlerin ölümüyle ilgili rahatsız edici haberler, Lord Kaptan'ı ve maiyetini uçsuz gemisinin derinliklerine inmeye zorladı. Bu suçların gizemi, şu anda makro top bakımından sorumlu bir klanın bölgesinde çözüldü: Hür Tacir'in şahsi ziyareti, sabotaj hazırlığında olan bir grup hainin kaçmasına yol açtı ve planlarını erken uygulamaya koymaya zorladı. Her dakika önemli: İsyancılar patlayıcıları tetiklerse bölme tamamen yok olacak! Savaşa!
languages.original_text: Troubling news concerning the deaths of some patrolmen has forced the Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} retinue to descend into the voidship's depths in person. The mystery of these crimes was unravelled in the domain of a clan currently charged with macro-cannon maintenance: a personal visit from the Rogue Trader scared off a group of traitors who were preparing an act of sabotage, forcing them to act prematurely. Every minute counts: if the mutineers trigger the explosives, the bay will be obliterated! To battle!
